sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "../styles/tour-details.css" import { Col, Container, Row, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours" import calculateavgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews,address, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour; const {totalRating,avgRating}=calculateavgRating(reviews) return <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} ${price}/person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* tour review */}

Reviews({reviews?.l}Reviews)

{/* end section */}
} export default TourDetails
